original_text: And the children of Israel heard say, Behold, the children of Reuben and the children of Gad and the half tribe of Manasseh have built an altar over against the land of Canaan, in the borders of Jordan, at the passage of the children of Israel.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 들은즉 이르기를 르우벤 자손과 갓 자손과 므낫세 반 지파가 가나안 땅의 맨 앞쪽 요단 언덕 가 이스라엘 자손에게 속한 쪽에 제단을 쌓았다 하는지라

sentences.original_text: And the children of Israel heard say,
the children of Reuben and the children of Gad
and the half tribe of Manasseh
over against the land of Canaan,
at the passage of the children of Israel.
